data.title: Childrens Services
data.meta_description: Childrens Services . Find out more about services from the BBS Society. We offer support to those with Osteogenesis Imperfecta and their families.
data.text:
The Society continues to work collaboratively with the four nationally commissioned Highly Specialised Services (HSS) whom have an interest in paediatric Osteogenesis Imperfecta in England, and other regional centres throughout the UK and Ireland.

England

Birmingham Children’s Hospital (HSS)

Bristol Royal Hospital for Children (HSS)

Great Ormond Street Hospital, London (HSS)

Sheffield Children’s Hospital (HSS)

Royal Manchester Children’s Hospital

Scotland

Royal Hospital for Children, Glasgow

Royal Hospital for Children and Young People, Edinburgh

Northern Ireland

Musgrave Park Hospital, Belfast

The Republic of Ireland

Temple Street Children’s University Hospital, Dublin

Wales
